title: Non-google weather widgets freezing
content: I've posted my problem yesterday here: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/108537007/weather-widget-hangs-freezing-not-updating?hl=en but for some reason some idiot marked it as duplicate and linked to another post which is not related to my problem. My problem is not about disappearing GOOGLE weather widget, my problem is about freezing third party weather widgets, all at the same time which unlikely is a problem with them.
